metadata.title: CVE-2024-43417 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. An unauthenticateduser can provide a malicious link to a GLPI technician in order to exploita reflected XSS vulnerability located in the Software form. Upgrade to10.0.17.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
